cause.description:
It's time to stop the oppressive efforts of christianity. too long has it dumbed down our societies. become free of the shackles of centuries old traditions and accept resonsibility of not only your actions but your envroment and way of life.
1. Indulgence not Abstinence.
2. Responsibility for all your actions.
3. Judge only the guilty.
cause.name: United Front of Satanic Extremists
